Articles.Content:
I love to dive in the ocean of 1.0.5

For a greater experience on this it would be cool someone can add aquatic live forms and plants underwater. Maybe in Stock or as Mod...

Also nice would be underwater easter eggs like sunken ships or buildings of ancient kerbals...

I don't see that coming in stock, at least not any time soon, since the Kerbal Space Program devs focus on Space for some reason, we do not have any animals (except for Kerbals) anyway, and plants (other than grass) only as ground scatter, but maybe the mod developers get more interested in underwater stuff now that that's actually somewhat interesting.
Perhaps they could add a sunken temple Easter egg or something along those lines??
Ground scatter for oceans would be cool.

We now have the ability to explore offworld seas, there should be something when we are there. maybe not necessarily alien animals or plantlife, but something to make the destination exciting.

I've been interested in a realworld mission to explore Titans seas for a long time, but anything has yet to come of that. https://www.nasa.gov/content/titan-submarine-exploring-the-depths-of-kraken/

We now have the ability to explore offworld seas, there should be something when we are there. maybe not necessarily alien animals or plantlife, but something to make the destination exciting.

I've been interested in a realworld mission to explore Titans seas for a long time, but anything has yet to come of that. https://www.nasa.gov/content/titan-submarine-exploring-the-depths-of-kraken/

We need an update just about planets. There's so many amazing landmarks on Earth alone. Image what you could do with a solar system. ...and I'm not talking about silly easter eggs.

A few underwater easter eggs are in order I think.

The possibilities for Laythe though... Laythe has the most potential for life other than Kerbin (assuming that is water, which it certainly behaves like) so it would be really cool if there were a few interesting things to study in the water. Perhaps an underwater crashed UFO (USO?) or special underwater ground scatter for volcanic sea vents. No confirmation of life existing, just the possibility.

volcanic sea vents.

yassssss

I dunno. Maybe there ALREADY IS an underwater Easter egg but it has not yet been discovered. Maybe this is why squad has added this water system. Maybe the underwater Easter egg points to another underwater waster egg. The ocean is the one thing that has not bin scoured for Easter eggs.

I dunno. Maybe there ALREADY IS an underwater Easter egg but it has not yet been discovered. Maybe this is why squad has added this water system. Maybe the underwater Easter egg points to another underwater waster egg. The ocean is the one thing that has not bin scoured for Easter eggs.

Us planet modders would have found it already. Unless one was added in 1.0.5 (which I suppose isn't impossible), it would have appeared as a PQSCity object in the list of PQSMods.
Now the possibility to explore underwater is a thing the addition of some anomalies to find would be cool. Not to mention contracts to collect science from underwater or a sample from the seabed.

Well, there technically is an easter egg underwater already, but It's not like a monolith or anything, just a

It's still kinda hard to visit...

i could see a few easter eggs hidden under the oceans of kerbin, laythe, and eve. i dont see plants and life though. but, the could be a new science part that detects for microbial life.
